EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-09-15 CWOM Webinar Invite.sendwbanner
EmailTemplate.subject: [Webinar] Cisco Workload Optimization Powered by Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://cisco.webex.com/mw3200/mywebex/default.do?nomenu=true&siteurl=cisco&service=6&rnd=0.7576131536681954&main_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcisco.webex.com%2Fec3200%2Feventcenter%2Fevent%2FeventAction.do%3FtheAction%3Ddetail%26%26%26EMK%3D4832534b00000004c5aa7674d1ac086f64a74383c04751ed21121f962720121e8037383e029a8dd4%26siteurl%3Dcisco%26confViewID%3D71078191781949769%26encryptTicket%3DSDJTSwAAAARE1iuDx1fxiYXBYQNWwKvWAi9CzPO4ljawCrhbYiRNUg2%26]]> Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Do you wish your data center would manage itself? Now, with Cisco and Turbonomic, it can.
Join our webinar <[[https://cisco.webex.com/mw3200/mywebex/default.do?nomenu=true&siteurl=cisco&service=6&rnd=0.7576131536681954&main_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcisco.webex.com%2Fec3200%2Feventcenter%2Fevent%2FeventAction.do%3FtheAction%3Ddetail%26%26%26EMK%3D4832534b00000004c5aa7674d1ac086f64a74383c04751ed21121f962720121e8037383e029a8dd4%26siteurl%3Dcisco%26confViewID%3D71078191781949769%26encryptTicket%3DSDJTSwAAAARE1iuDx1fxiYXBYQNWwKvWAi9CzPO4ljawCrhbYiRNUg2%26]]> on Thursday, September 21, 2017 12:00pm EDT to learn how Cisco Workload Optimization Manager, powered by Turbonomic, safely increases the performance and utilization of your UCS-based data center. You will learn how to increase workload response time by 37%, increase workload density by 25% and reduce trouble tickets by 50%. <[[tion.do%3FtheAction%3Ddetail%26%26%26EMK%3D4832534b00000004c5aa7674d1ac086f64a74383c04751ed21121f962720121e8037383e029a8dd4%26siteurl%3Dcisco%26confViewID%3D71078191781949769%26encryptTicket%3DSDJTSwAAAARE1iuDx1fxiYXBYQNWwKvWAi9CzPO4ljawCrhbYiRNUg2%26]]> Like funny videos with robots? Check out this blog for a great video on why customers want self-managing data centers <[[https://blogs.cisco.com/datacenter/real-time-optimization-ensures-workload-performance]]>.
Best, The Turbonomic Team
